Package dev.majek.advancements

Interface Advancement.Builder

Enclosing interface:
Advancement
public static interface Advancement.Builder
Advancement builder for additional configuration options.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • addTrigger

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder addTrigger(@NotNull @NotNull String id, @NotNull @NotNull Trigger trigger)
      Add a trigger for the advancement.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the trigger, all ids must be unique for a single advancement
      trigger - any extension of Trigger
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • addRequirement

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder addRequirement(@NotNull @NotNull String... requirement)
      Add a requirement to the advancement. These are the keys of the triggers that are required.
      Parameters:
      requirement - requirements which are separated by logical ORs (while separate calls to this method are separated by logical ANDs)
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • rewards

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder rewards(@Nullable @Nullable Rewards rewards)
      Set the rewards to be given on advancement completion.
      Parameters:
      rewards - the rewards which should be given upon completion of this advancement or null, if no rewards should be given
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • frame

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder frame(@NotNull @NotNull Frame frame)
      Set the frame of the advancement.
      Parameters:
      frame - the new frame style. Frame.TASK by default
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • toast

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder toast(boolean toast)
      Set whether there should be a toast popup on advancement completion. True by default.
      Parameters:
      toast - whether there should be a toast upon completion
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • announce

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder announce(boolean announce)
      Set whether the advancement completion should be announced in chat. True by default.
      Parameters:
      announce - whether there should be a chat message upon completion
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • hidden

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder hidden(boolean hidden)
      Set whether the child advancement is hidden until the parent is completed. False by default.
      Parameters:
      hidden - whether child advancement should be hidden
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • makeRoot

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder makeRoot(@NotNull @NotNull String background, boolean autoUnlock)
      Make this advancement a root advancement with a background.
      Parameters:
      background - the texture to set as the tab's background. Example value: blocks/gravel
      autoUnlock - whether the advancement should be unlocked by default. When true, a LocationTrigger is added and the announce and toast properties are set to false
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • makeChild

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement.Builder makeChild(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.NamespacedKey parent)
      Make this advancement a child of another advancement.
      Parameters:
      parent - the advancement id of the parent
      Returns:
      this builder
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • build

      @NotNull @NotNull Advancement build()
      Build the advancement.
      Returns:
      advancement
      Since:
      1.0.0
